proposal: Greetings Neutron enthusiasts! With your smart-contract platform scaling across 50+ Interchain, I reckon our DEX and Lottery tools could add some interstellar fuel to your journey. Imagine, your 644 holders could deploy these tools, sharing in the revenue and contributing to the ever-growing cosmos of Neutron. Let's bring more power to your permission-less universe. See my profile for demo and details.
